availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, soldier. Native of Glasgow, Scotland. Married to Almedy McCue. Father of Rebecca McCue. Served in the 2nd Kentucky Infantry (U.S.A.) as private from January 4, 1864 to July 5, 1864.

ab.bibl:
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Larue County, Otter Creek, p. 75B.
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 480.
U.S. Civil War Pension Index: General Index to Pension Files, 1861-1934, NARA RG 15, Microfilm Series T288, Application #526162, Certificate #616277.
